_header: My colors been both bright and sheen
Title(s): ‘ffor I am a brid of paradise’
_description: Words of the bird of paradise accompanying an illustration of same — two couplets

BodLatMisC66.Transcription:
Mi coloures byn both briȝt & shene& me desires bothe
                    kynge & qwenelordȝ & ladies of gret enpriseseffor I am a
                    brid od paradise
BodLatMisC66.Editions:
Hanna,  Ralph,
                        ed.  
             “Humphrey Newton and Bodleian Library, MS Lat. Misc. C.66.” 
             Medium Ævum
         69 (2000): 279-91: 279.
